title: UniCred
description:
UniCred is a crypto asset that provides opportunity to the public to "flatten the curve" when it comes their home country's currency inflating.
UniCred at its core is methodized to provide a decentralized benchmark currency in order to circumvent increasing international exchange fees.
There are 15 predominant currencies to which this benchmark applies : United States Dollar, Sterling Pound, Canadian Dollar, Swiss...
UniCred will collect a transaction fee and will available in CoinMarketCap in March 2023.
